components.description: A pale yellow stick of butter. Can be used to talk about cooking or eating. Might also be used in idioms or to reference something that is smooth.
components.title: Butter

description: A pale yellow stick of butter. Can be used to talk about cooking or eating. Might also be used in idioms or to reference something that is smooth.
title: Butter

version.description: Unicode 12.0 was released on March 5, 2019. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page. See Emoji 12.0 for the full 2019 emoji list. More about this update.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's butter emoji presents a rich, creamy yellow block, perfectly shaped with soft rounded edges that suggest its smooth, spreadable texture. Realistic lighting on Apple devices casts gentle shadows and highlights, giving the butter a tangible, appetizing appearance. This delectable emoji, with its inviting look on Apple devices, is commonly used when discussing food, cooking, or simply to add a touch of richness and comfort to conversations.
